effects.name: Ember
effects.description: Hits burn enemies for 5% of hit damage per tick.

effects.name: Venom
effects.description: Hits poison enemies for 1.25% of hit damage per tick. Deal 20% more damage to Poisoned enemies.

effects.name: Executioner
effects.description: Enemies below 25% HP take double damage.

effects.name: Maelstrom
effects.description: 15% chance on hit to pull nearby enemies toward the target.

effects.name: Shatter
effects.description: Deal 40% more damage to Frozen enemies. Killing a Frozen enemy causes an icy explosion.

effects.name: Cull
effects.description: Instantly kill non-boss enemies below 10% HP.

effects.name: Splinter
effects.description: 20% chance on hit for projectiles to split into two, each dealing 60% damage.

effects.name: Chain Lightning
effects.description: Hits chain to 2 nearby enemies within 150 range, dealing 70% damage per jump.
